title: Schiff, Himes on United States Joining the Paris Call for Trust and Security in Cyberspace
summary: "Threats from cyber crime and malicious online actors are a global problem, which will require a global solution and international cooperation to protect individuals, nation states, and businesses from potentially crippling cyber attacks against infrastructure, energy grids, and our economies. It is welcome news that the United States will join the Paris Call for Trust and Security in Cyberspace, ...
